event.title: Highest temperature in Denver on Dec 1, 2024?

markets.rules_primary: If the highest temperature recorded in Denver, CO for December 01, 2024 as reported by the National Weather Service's Daily Climate Report, is less than 47°, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary:
Please be advised to check to see what temperatures have occurred previously in the day. While the market resolves based on the finalized report from the NWS, traders should use other data sources--including other preliminary NWS reporting--to inform their trades.
 
The Last Trading Time will be 11:59 PM MT on December 01, 2024 regardless of any data releases or events occurring. Expiration will occur on the sooner of the first 7:00 or 8:00
AM ET following the release of the data for December 01, 2024, or one week after December 01, 2024.
